body:
Added support for fiat version 2016.2.0

Fix to compilation error of `dolfin` in `fenics` package with pre 2019.1.0 versions (observed during `fenics` package uplift).

Outsourced PR from [FEniCS 2019.1.0 PR](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21207).
title: py-fenics-fiat: amendment and fix of package
